Exposition

  • Motivating infinity-categorical thinking

    Talk notes. Describes a few simple ways in which higher category theory can be used to think about classical homotopy theory.

    23 Jan 2017
  • Characters in global equivariant homotopy theory

    My undergraduate thesis. On the generalized character theory of Hopkins-Kuhn-Ravenel and Stapleton.

    23 Mar 2015
  • Vector fields and the J-homomorphism

    Final paper. On Adams's work on counting vector fields on spheres and the J-homomorphism.

    09 May 2014
  • Defining the cotangent complex

    Final paper. On Quillen's application of the theory of model categories to defining a homology theory for algebras.

    17 Dec 2013
  • The Dold-Kan correspondence

    Talk notes. A proof of the titular result, and a couple of quick consequences.

    26 Oct 2013

About

I’m currently a PhD student in mathematics at Stanford. I was an undergraduate at Harvard from 2011–2015 and spent 2015–2016 at the University of Cambridge.

My mathematical interests are centered around homotopy theory.
